recon.ai.noConfident: Nta cyizere gihagije. Reba amahitamo cyangwa uhuze intoki.

recon.ai.upgradeRequired: Ongera uburenganzira kugira ngo ukoreshe icyifuzo.
recon.detail.title: Ibisobanuro by'ubwishyu

recon.errors.noSharedReference: Imirongo mutoranyije nta ndango imwe ifite.
recon.errors.sameReferenceRequired: Imirongo yose igomba kugirana indango imwe kugira ngo ihuzwe byikora.
recon.exceptions.subtitle: Ibibazo byagaragaye ubwo hasesengurwaga ubutumwa.
recon.exceptions.title: Ibibazo byabonetse
recon.guidance.duplicate: Gereranya n'ubundi butumwa bufite iyi ndango.
recon.guidance.lowConfidence: Ongera wemeze amafaranga n'indango mbere yo kubyemeza.
recon.guidance.manualReview: Suzuma ibimenyetso mbere yo guhindura imiterere.
recon.guidance.missingReference: Shyiraho indango SACCO.IKIMINA(.MEMBER) mbere yo kubyemeza.
recon.guidance.msisdnMismatch: Andika nimero ya telefoni ku nyandiko kugirango bizafashe guhuza ku buryo bwikora.
recon.guidance.needsMember: Huza n'umunyamuryango kugirango ukureho amafaranga ataraboneka.
recon.guidance.parserFailure: Hindura imiterere ya SMS wongere ubishakishe cyangwa ubihuze intoki.
recon.momo.assignSacco: Iyandikishe kuri SACCO kugira ngo ushobore kwakira raporo.
recon.momo.note1: Kurura dosiye za MTN CSV, umufasha akazihindura igihe cya Kigali, nimero na z'amafaranga mu buryo bwikora.
recon.momo.note2: Ibisubizo bya sisitemu bigaragaza ibyasubiyemo, indango zibura, n'imirongo ituzuye mbere yo kwinjiza.
recon.momo.note3: Imirongo yemejwe ni yo igerera kuri Supabase; ibyasubiyemo n'amakuru atari yo bigumishwa kugira ngo bisuzumwe n'abakozi.
recon.momo.subtitle: Shyiraho igenzura, urebe ibisubizo bya sisitemu, winjize imisanzu isukuye.
recon.momo.title: Kuzana raporo za MoMo
recon.sms.subtitle: Ubutumwa bwa MoMo bwakiriwe, bwiteguye gusesengurwa.
recon.sms.title: Ubutumwa bwa SMS
recon.subtitle: Kuraho indango zitazwi, ibyasubiyemo, n'ibitagize uko bikwiye kugira ngo konti zibe nzima.
recon.title: Guhuza konti
